title: France panorama. [No. 68/??]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items: 1. Nouvelle ligne - The description and style of the Soy Peugeot highlighting the qualities and features of this new car. 2. The fashion designer, Louis Feraud, takes us through his Autumn Collection that is stylish, innovative and youthful. 3. The Oscar winner, Maurice Chevalier, shows his diverse passions and drive to keep acting at the age of 80. 4. Chateau Brand, the French writer and founder of Romanticism, died in 1818. This is about his life and times in France.
